body:
I can't reproduce this issue. Just to clarify, is it just the markers that don't refresh or is the clang output and status bar status also not refreshing?

Do you get anything printed in the python console? (Menu item View->Show Console)

Everything is failing to refresh: markers, output, and status bar info.

There is nothing in the console besides the normal `Writing file [...]` messages.
I think I found it, could you try updating the plugin and see if it works now and if so close the issue? Thanks :)
